alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Fairfield; Kershaw; Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 4:47PM EDT until August 15 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Fairfield County in central South Carolina... Lancaster County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Chesterfield County in central South Carolina... Northern Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 447 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near USC Lancaster to near Springdale, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Springdale, Lake Wateree Dam, Pageland, Kershaw, Elgin, Heath Springs, Westville, USC Lancaster, Irwin, Liberty Hill, Mt Pisgah, Longtown, Buford, Lake Wateree State Park, Jefferson, North Central High School, Arrowood Estates, Bell Town Fire Station, and Faith Christian School. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
